thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com | 4 of 259
thread.title: Todd

author: Todd
title: Todd
text: I needed mailbox numbers in a specific color, font and size. I didn't know exactly which font or size I needed and was not able to find a match in any of the office supply or local hardware stores. DoItYourselfLettering has a very well set up website which allows you to preview and compare fonts and I was able to get exactly what I needed for less than the cost of the gas I had already spent driving around to stores looking for something I couldn't find anyway. The mailbox numbers got to me exactly when promised and came with excellent instructions on how to attach the vinyl, which worked well.
